value_claims.claim_title: Canva enables 8-second video clip generation with synchronized audio using text prompts
value_claims.claim_description: Users can generate 8-second video clips with synchronized audio directly from text or voice prompts within Canva's interface, powered by Google's Veo 3 model.
value_claims.source_quote: The new feature allows users to generate 8-second video clips with synchronized audio using voice or text prompts in a single workflow.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The video generation capability is directly powered by Google's Veo 3 AI model, with AI performing the core video and audio creation from text prompts.

value_claims.claim_title: Video generation accessible within seconds through conversational interface
value_claims.claim_description: Users can input prompts and generate video clips in seconds, with generation taking under 2 minutes, making video creation significantly faster than traditional methods.
value_claims.source_quote: Users can input a prompt describing the desired content and generate a video in seconds. Video generations take a little under 2 minutes.
value_claims.quote_location: S1, final paragraph; S3, How to try section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The speed improvement is directly attributable to AI-powered video generation, replacing manual video creation workflows.

value_claims.claim_title: Democratization of cinematic-quality video creation for millions of users
value_claims.claim_description: Integration brings cinematic-style video creation to millions without specialized software or skills, making professional video accessible through existing Canva subscriptions.
value_claims.source_quote: The integration brings cinematic-style video creation to millions without the need for specialized software or skills.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI video generation directly enables users without video production skills to create professional-quality content, removing technical barriers.

value_claims.claim_title: Consolidated creative workflow integrating video with existing design tools
value_claims.claim_description: Videos open directly in Canva's built-in editor for customization with branding, text, music, and integration into social media posts, presentations, and other formats.
value_claims.source_quote: These clips open in Canva's built-in video editor, where they can be further customised using branding tools, text, music, and other elements. The videos can also be added to social media posts, presentations or other formats.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI generates the initial video content, while the workflow integration and editing capabilities combine AI with traditional design tools.

value_claims.claim_title: Multi-format AI content generation in single platform
value_claims.claim_description: Users can generate text, images, full design layouts, and now video with Canva AI, consolidating multiple creative tools in one workflow as part of multi-model approach.
value_claims.source_quote: Users can already generate text, images, and full design layouts with Canva AI. The addition of video generation brings a new format to the existing workflow.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Multiple AI models directly power text, image, design, and video generation capabilities within the unified platform.

context_claims.claim_title: Canva is a design and creative content platform
context_claims.claim_description: Canva operates as an all-in-one design platform offering creative tools for social media, presentations, and other content formats.
context_claims.source_quote: The feature enables users to produce 8-second video clips directly from the Canva interface.

context_claims.claim_title: Feature launched in 2025 following Google I/O 2025
context_claims.claim_description: The Create a Video Clip feature was launched shortly after Google released Veo 3 at I/O 2025, marking one of the first integrations of the technology.
context_claims.source_quote: This marks one of the first major integrations of Google Veo 3 into a design platform, and it comes just weeks after Google first debuted the model at I/O 2025.

context_claims.claim_title: Feature available on paid subscription tiers
context_claims.claim_description: Create a Video Clip is available to Canva Pro, Teams, Enterprise, and Nonprofit users, with Pro starting at $15/month or $120/year.
context_claims.source_quote: The feature is available to Canva users on paid plans, including Pro, Teams, Enterprise, and Canva for Nonprofits.

context_claims.claim_title: Limited to 5 video generations per month initially
context_claims.claim_description: Users have access to five video generations per month at launch, with plans to extend usage capacity in the future.
context_claims.source_quote: Access is limited to five video generations per month initially, with plans to extend usage in the future.

context_claims.claim_title: Mission to democratize design and empower creative expression
context_claims.claim_description: Canva's core mission is to enable anyone to bring their ideas to life and empower the world to design, with focus on democratizing access to powerful creative technologies.
context_claims.source_quote: Enabling anyone to bring their ideas to life – especially their most creative ones – has been core to Canva's mission ever since we set out to empower the world to design.

context_claims.claim_description: Leonardo.Ai is owned by Canva and also receives the Veo 3 integration, with subscriptions starting at $10/month.
context_claims.source_quote: For those unaware, Leonardo.Ai is owned by Canva.

context_claims.claim_title: Safety and content moderation through Canva Shield framework
context_claims.claim_description: Feature includes safety checks to prevent harmful content production and offers indemnity for eligible enterprise users under Canva Shield trust and safety system.
context_claims.source_quote: Create a Video Clip will be moderated under its Canva Shield framework, which includes safety checks to prevent the production of harmful or unsafe content and offers indemnity for eligible enterprise users.

context_claims.claim_title: Multi-model AI approach to consolidate creative tools
context_claims.claim_description: Canva pursues a multi-model strategy aimed at consolidating diverse creative tools and AI capabilities into a single unified platform.
context_claims.source_quote: According to Canva, the integration is part of its multi-model approach, which aims to consolidate creative tools in a single platform.

context_claims.claim_title: Partnership with Google for Veo 3 integration
context_claims.claim_description: Canva partnered with Google to become one of the first platforms to offer Google's Veo 3 video generation model.
context_claims.source_quote: This is a step change in AI-powered creativity, and we're thrilled to partner with Google on being one of the first platforms to offer Veo 3.

context_claims.claim_title: Video creation for marketing and social media content
context_claims.claim_description: The feature supports use cases including social media posts, brand videos, pitch decks, presentations, and marketing content creation.
context_claims.source_quote: Canva's all-in-one AI strategy democratises cutting-edge tech, while combining video generation and editing in one workflow transforms creative possibilities for social posts, brand videos, pitch decks and more.
